channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: SK Hynix’s Speedy Beetle X31 Now Available In New 2TB Capacity
item.description: This cute and affordable Beetle X31 USB SSD promises faster speeds than many thumb drives and is available in 512GB, 1TB and 2TB capacities.

item.title: Bongo 4 – Thinking about power users (skive!)
item.description: Power users are tempting. They know what they want, they’re happy to share their preferences and they show up. But power users can also be a trap, bec...

item.title: Google Confirms New Gmail Security Surprise—And It’s So Simple
item.description: Not all security features are complicated; the best ones are often both simple and surprising—Google has announced just such a security surprise for G...

item.title: Thinking about jobs
item.description: Since I was born, the planet has invented 6 billion jobs. Technology is said to threaten the replacement of human labor, yet, somehow we’ve found usef...

item.title: See A Marvelous Moondance As ‘Christmas Star’ Glows: The Night Sky This Week
item.description: Each Monday, I pick out North America’s celestial highlights for the week ahead (which also applies to northern hemisphere mid-northern latitudes).

item.title: Books and more, winter 2024

item.title: Time To Innovate: How Established Businesses Can Differentiate Through Modernization
item.description: An abundance of relevant data gives established organizations the potential to introduce strong, modernized tools from the outset.

item.title: Transforming Data Centers: A Vision For Sustainable Technology
item.description: The future of data centers lies in sustainability and transparency.

item.title: Speed, creativity and AI
